post.content: Project scope: Mobile phone applications that display categories, list of videos under a category and detail of a video, and play selected video. Development scope: 1) Login: Not defined yet 2) After successfull login, send a request for categories http://66.46.245.208:8180/user/vod/categories Display categories 3) When a category is selected, send a request for video list under the category http://66.46.245.208:8180/user/vod/vodlist/Family Display the list of videos 4) When a video is selected, send a request for the video detail http://66.46.245.208:8180/user/vod/asset/5211 Display the asset 5) When ‘play’ button is clicked, play the video(pick one of url in the media outputs from the previous stage http://66.46.245.211/3gp/BigBuckBunny1.3gp Target devices: Android Phone, iPhone, Java based phone, Windows Phone, Please submit a proposal to jameslee.ca@gmail.com no later than April 10, the proposal includes price, delivery date and terms.
